modName: Faallokaar - The loyal voiced dragon and human follower
summary:
Ever gazed at the dragons of Skyrim, and wondered: "Darn, if I had one of those guys on my side, I'd be strong as heck!"

Well now you can have a dragon follower! Faallokaar!
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=red]THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR 200+ ENDORSEMENTS![/color][/size]

[size=4][color=red]Videos[/color][/size]
[youtube]sXuaFSbQMRk[/youtube]
[youtube]52TkQpHxcj0[/youtube]

[size=4][color=red]Description[/color][/size]

Faallokaar is not like Odahviing. You don't have to call him, and wait half a minute for him to show up. He walks by your side, wherever you might go!

If you install the [size=3][color=red]Yol[/color][/size] version, his color reminds that of lava, and he can breathe fireballs, and fire, at your enemies!

[img]http://s12.postimg.org/5dauwuagt/Yol.jpg[/img]

If you install the [size=3][color=cyan]Fo[/color][/size] version (which as of update 2.0 does [size=3][color=red]NOT[/color][/size] require the [size=3][color=red]Yol[/color][/size] version) his colour reminds that of a glacier, and he can breathe iceballs, and ice, at your enemies!

[img]http://s12.postimg.org/j5p9sh18d/image.jpg[/img]

He even has his own voice! He won't shout at your face when you ask him to do something, he will talk! using a deep, awesome voice a dragon should have!

He is just a great dragon, who is powerful enough to not break the game, but also able to help you with your enemies!

[size=4][color=red]On update 2.0, I made another custom shout, which transforms Faallokaar into his human form, and if you use it again on him, he returns to his original dragon self! You can now explore dungeons with Faallokaar by your side as a human! PLEASE DO NOT TRANSFORM HIM TO A DRAGON WHILE INDOORS.

You will find the book to learn the "Transform Faallokaar" shout in his inventory, along with the book to learn the "Land Faallokaar" shout, which I explain right below what it is.[/color][/size]

[size=4][color=red]On update 1.5, I made a custom shout, so that you can use your Thu'um to make him land. Once you meet him, go to the option that opens his inventory, and read the book that you see in there to learn the shout! So, if you need him to come down, shout, and let him know![/color][/size]

[size=4][color=red]Future Plans[/color][/size]

Currently he is in a very developed state, which I call 2.0. Flight was achieved in update 1.2, and transformation to a human was achieved in update 2.0! Now, I'm planning to add a LOT more dialogue, to make him a super chill dude to talk to, and also a big variety of skins to suit your preference! Maybe one day make him rideable too!

[img]http://s27.postimg.org/mnylfpwmb/image.jpg[/img]

[size=4][color=red]Installation[/color][/size]

Download the version of your preference, install, play! if you don't use the Nexus Mod Manager, extract, put the two files in your Skyrim Data folder, play!

To update, just uninstall the previous version, install the newest one, and you're ready!

[size=3][color=red]If you're using a follower mod like UFO, AFT, etc, make sure Faallokaar is under it in the load order![/color][/size]

Once you load the game after installing him (I hope you will install him!), you will receive a quest to meet him at Dragon Bridge. He will introduce himself, and then be ready to fight amongst you!

I strongly recommend to not have any other follower under your service when you meet him.

[size=4][color=red]Also[/color][/size]

Like I said previously, I hope you install him! And if you do, let me know your opinions! Your feedback is most valuable to me! Make sure you leave a comment about your experience with Faallokaar! It helps me tremendously to keep making him better!

Have fun with Faallokaar!

[size=4][color=red]Changelog[/color][/size]

[size=4][color=red]2.0......13/5/2014[/color][/size]
Added another custom shout that transforms Faallokaar to his human form, and if cast again, reverts him to his dragon form. Fixed problem where Faallokaar's texture would replace the one of other dragons! The old Fo patch is now the Fo version! a standalone version! No need for Yol if you want Fo!
[size=4][color=red]1.5......7/5/2014[/color][/size]
Added a custom shout that makes Faallokaar land on the ground. Faallokaar will now wait outside if you go indoors. The mod is now made up of just 2 files. A .BSA file, and a .ESP file. No more loose files!
[size=4][color=red]1.4......21/1/2014[/color][/size]
Fixed flight bug where Faallokaar would fly in the ground. Specifically, when you fast traveled when he was still flying.
[size=4][color=red]1.3......19/1/2014[/color][/size]
Fixed several flight bugs, decided to make Faallokaar a follower for outdoors only.
[size=4][color=red]1.2......12/1/2014[/color][/size]
Flight introduced, fixed choppy animation when going far away from Faallokaar.
[size=4][color=red]1.1......10/1/2014[/color][/size]
Added [size=3][color=cyan]Fo[/color][/size] patch, which turns Faallokaar into a dragon of ice.
[size=4][color=red]1.0......9/1/2014[/color][/size]
Initial release.
author: Bifteki
